chosen_as_assistant.text: I'll sort out your battlefield reports for you. My officialese isn't too shabby. I'll stand guard during your rest hours. Anything else required...? I'd prefer you don't keep me idle.

talk_1.text: HasBagpipekept up her habit of humming around you? Me? I'm more the type to appreciate music in peace. The only thing a horn can play is the order to charge–I'm joking of course, Doctor.

talk_2.text: The name "White Wolf" goes as far back in history as theAslanmonarchy. Why are you interested, though? ...Ah. You saw... my fangs? I'm sorry, I lost control of myself then. I won't let it happen again.

talk_3.text: I have beautiful handwriting? Thank you. It just comes with the facade when you're raised noble, which I've never been keen on. But sometime these days, I'm grateful for it–whenever I pick up a pen, everything else leaves my mind, and my focus is only on how I write every letter in the proper way.

talk_after_elite_1_[[promotion]].text: Asthat cityspat great black crystalsfrom its gaping wounds, I thought there could be no hope left for it... Is this place familiar with those madeInfectednot byCatastrophe, but by human hands,DoctorofRhodes Island?

talk_after_elite_2_promotion.text: Rhodes Island OperatorMiserymanaged to rescue me twice, and I'm sincerely grateful for it. I won't ask why I was the one he rescued. Those who live on are to carry forth the wishes of those who didn't make it.

talk_after_[[trust]]_increase_1.text: I always feel stifled by gloomy indoor atmospheres. Do you want to go out and take a walk, Doctor? It might be overcast, but at least there'll be a breeze. There are times you can hear singing on the wind too, not just the echo of your own words.

talk_after_trust_increase_2.text: I can vaguely remember the portraits of my ancestors decorated with medals in the hall. I also recall the épée carved with the Lion King's orders, and the maples my father planted in the front courtyard... but that's all that comes to me. I haven't returned home in a long, long while. In Her chaotic theater,Victoria's soldiers have no time to file for leave.

talk_after_trust_increase_3.text: Doctor, does a commander as outstanding as you ever feel sorrow? Or anger? Or... hate? I try as hard as I can not to let personal emotions sway me, but I can't forget. I promised them I would never forget.

idle.text: How do you sleep, after having witnessed so much cruelty...? If I could do the same as you, with a simple shut of my eyes, would I feel any better?

introduction.text: Tempest Platoon Leader Horn reporting in, Doctor of Rhodes Island. I've already borne witness to your own tactics, and the fighting spirit of Rhodes Island's operators. Under our ensuing cooperation, I and my troops will heed your orders.

given_[[battle_record]]s.text: No amount of training can ever suffice.

elite_1_promotion.text: Thank you. I'll regard this as a commendation of my performance, and not a reflection of my status.

elite_2_promotion.text: Confer your emblems of rank on me. I'm willing... No. I must bear the hopes of more. Of those past, now, and to come.

added_to_squad.text: Victoria's servicemen should take pride in their own discipline.

chosen_as_squad_leader.text: I trust in my platoonmates at any and all times. I'd like you to put that same trust in me.

[[operation]]_start.text: We have no time to hesitate. There are souls waiting for us, behind the firing line.

an_enemy_is_about_to_spawn.text: I'll put up my shield. Don't stand in front of me.

selected_1.text: Allow me to study your command style in this battle, Doctor.

selected_2.text: At attention. Ready to fall in.

[[skill]]_activation_1.text: The Tempest must wipe out all that blocks the way.

skill_activation_2.text: Come! Best me if you can!

skill_activation_3.text: I'll impart on you all the cries I've heard.

skill_activation_4.text: You want to topple me? By what?

operation_cleared_(4-star).text: One victory may not be enough to impact a whole war, but it can at least give more people a chance to see the open sky.

operation_cleared_(2-star).text: Any mercy on the enemy is a potential disaster. Let me lead my troops to settle this.

operation_failed.text: Not a worry, Doctor. Until you've gotten everyone away, I will not fall.

assigned_to_[[riic]].text: It doesn't resemble Victoria here, but... it reminds me of when I studied at the Royal Guard Academy.

tap.text: Sorry, I'm not used to setting down my weapons. Did I bruise you?

trust_tap.text: Hm...? I'm just reading an ordinary novel. I've gone an awfully long time without reading something new. All the written word went up in the fires of war.

greetings.text: Hello, Doctor. Have you rested well?
